definition: To indicate movement from an interior space to an exterior space, typically used in the context of leaving or going out.

examples.german: Er schaute hinaus durch das Fenster.
examples.english: He looked out through the window.

examples.german: Wir gingen hinaus in den Garten.
examples.english: We went out into the garden.

examples.german: Sie stie√ü ihn hinaus aus dem Zimmer.
examples.english: She pushed him out of the room.

examples.german: Die Katze sprang hinaus aus dem Baum.
examples.english: The cat jumped out of the tree.
